thread.title: Revealed: Mubarak Wakaso has picked up three yellow cards in three games for Las Palmas
thread.title_full: Revealed: Mubarak Wakaso has picked up three yellow cards in three games for Las Palmas

title: Revealed: Mubarak Wakaso has picked up three yellow cards in three games for Las Palmas
text:
Sports News | 30 September 2015 21:55 CET Revealed: Mubarak Wakaso has picked up three yellow cards in three games for Las Palmas - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana midfielder Mubarak Wakaso in action 
Las Palmas midfielder Mubarak Wakaso is the player with most yellow cards for his club this season after picking up three cautions in his last three games. 
The 25-year-old Ghana international faces a ban if he picks up another yellow card in the game against Eibar this weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The day a true lover you keep hurting can look into your eyes without hurting, you will hurt By: sam-f ( Da Bar Owna)
